createNameFromAlias

public java.lang.String createNameFromAlias(java.lang.String alias)
Convert a valid alias to a valid rule name. Since an alias may have fewer restrictions on what is considered valid, need to be able to create one from the other Method may return null or empty if there is no valid name that can be generated from the given alias

Specified by:
createNameFromAlias in interface BusinessRulesModel
Parameters:
alias - alias
Returns:
a valid name based on the alias, or null/empty if not possible
